data.event: Burton was founded in 1798 and is Geauga County's oldest settlement.
Scripps-Howard Broadcasting Co., the high court ruled in 1977 that the First Amendment did not shield the broadcaster from liability from common law copyright claims.
The Claridon Elementary School was closed in 2005, and the Troy Elementary School was closed in 2009.
